title: Fred Smeijers on Legibility
content:
FontShop's FontFeed has a great piece on the trouble with defining "legibility" written by [Fred Smeijers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103223500/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fred%20Smeijers).

Worth a read: [Fred Smeijers on Legibility](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103223500/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/fred_smeijers_on_legibility.cfm#42)
author: Joe Pemberton
